content.value:
My Twitter life flashed before my eyes when I thought I’ll be “shadowbanned” forever 😭

All those tweets, all that audience curated can just go poof for whatever reason

I thought about switching to newsletter to “own my platform”, isn’t that still another form of platform?
content.html: My Twitter life flashed before my eyes when I thought I’ll be “shadowbanned” forever 😭 All those tweets, all that audience curated can just go poof for whatever reason I thought about switching to newsletter to “own my platform”, isn’t that still another form of platform?
